title: The Glimmering Hive
trigger_condition: Player enters an abandoned industrial zone at night
description: A faint, pulsating blue glow emanates from a collapsed factory. Inside, a hive of mutated bioluminescent insects has made its home, their light revealing scattered pre-war machinery and suppliesâ€”but the buzzing grows louder as you approach.

choices.consequence: Gain 3 Biolight Pods (usable as light sources), but risk 25% chance of alerting the hive and taking minor poison damage.

choices.option: Lure a Scavenger Mongrel into the hive as distraction
choices.consequence: Lose 1 Raw Meat bait, but safely loot 2 Random Electronic Components and 1 Energy Cell with no combat.

choices.option: Set the hive ablaze with makeshift fuel
choices.consequence: Gain 5 Insect Chitin (crafting material) and clear the area permanently, but destroy all other loot and draw attention from nearby hostile creatures.

choices.option: Leave immediately and seal the entrance
choices.consequence: Avoid all risk, but gain nothing. Area remains inaccessible for 7 days.

duration: Until dawn (in-game 8 hours) or until player resolves the event
